nodes.title: Very neat & useful app!
nodes.text:
Nice support for simple sending of media links to Kodi. Glad to support the author.

One simple feature request. There is an option to turn on auto play when sharing. Can an option be added to auto add to playlist as well? This would make queuing simpler, one less click.

And a question, is there a way to make SendToKodi show up when sharing from youtube app without clicking ‚ÄòMore...‚Äô Right now it‚Äôs defaulting to Copy Link, Messages, Gmail and Whatsapp (?!)
nodes.name: Choppa_80

nodes.title: Turned my Odroid XU4 into a Chromecast!
nodes.text: Sweet! I have an Odroid XU4 with Retropie and Kodi installed. I have it set up to a projector with a 100‚Äù screen. I had a Chromecast hooked up to it but I wanted retro gaming on my screen. My Samsung phone can do what this app does with the official Kore app but on with the Kodi remote app on ios. So I downloaded this to get the same functionality. It works! I honestly only cast youtube, youtube music, and rarely Plex. This app is not going to give you the full Chromecast experience but for me it‚Äôs perfect due to my casual use.
